name: Square Escape!
description:
This is a Game Made With Just One Script as a Challenge. You can download this game for free.

In this game you will have to escape through all the hexagons which are spawning countinuasly, so just escape and create a very cool high score!, and also don't forget to check out my Youtube Channel, where I create tutorials and also devlogs/devblogs about my games progress so just give it a look!

Thanks For Reading This!
